mapper.select: select sm.no, sm.type, se.splace, se.eplace, sm.point, u.id from spotmate sm, car c, users u, (select s.sMateNo, s.splace, e.eMateNo, e.ePlace from (select p.mateNo sMateNo, p.place sPlace from place p where p.wayNo = -1) s, (select p.mateNo eMateNo, p.place ePlace from place p where p.wayNo = 0) e where s.sMateNo = e.eMateNo) se where sm.no = se.sMateNo and c.no = sm.carNo and u.no = c.userNo
select u.id, w.star, w.content from users u, reservation r, userReview w where u.no = r.driverNo and r.no = w.resvNo

select u.id, sm.startDate, sm.point
from spotmate sm, car c, users u, (select s.sMateNo, s.splace, e.eMateNo, e.ePlace from (select p.mateNo sMateNo, p.place sPlace from place p where p.wayNo = -1) s, (select p.mateNo eMateNo, p.place ePlace from place p where p.wayNo = 0) e where s.sMateNo = e.eMateNo) se where sm.no = se.sMateNo and c.no = sm.carNo and u.no = c.userNo

select u.id, c.carName, c.carPicture, c.introduce, s.comments, o.name from users u, car c, spotmate s, spotDetail d, detailOption o where u.no = c.userNo and c.no = s.carNo and s.no = d.mateNo and o.no = d.detailNo and u.no = #{no}
